name: Mammoth

trait.name: Trampling Charge
text: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

description:
A mammoth is an elephantine creature with thick fur and long tusks. Stockier and fiercer than normal elephants, mammoths inhabit a wide range of climes, from subarctic to subtropical.
Source: Monster Manual p. 332, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
